p: Eleven of the thirteen HCWs were symptomatic with only mild symptoms, one was totally asymptomatic who was detected by contact tracing, and one had severe disease that required ICU admission but ultimately recovered. 225 HCWs who were the total staff working in RU, ICU and cardiac ward were screened for MERS-CoV regardless of their contact history with cases or infected HCWs. Of the total 23 MERS-CoV infected individuals, 8 died (overall mortality 35%). Of the 10 patients with MERS-CoV infection, eight died (80% mortality). None of the HCWs died No HCW reported contact with camels or camel products.
